Identification_Area.title: Lunar Heat-Flow Experiment: Final Technical Report

Citation_Information.description: Monograph-length discussion of Apollo HFE instrument architecture, engineering challenges, and collected data up through the end of 1974.

Modification_Detail.description: Document copied from NASA Technical Reports Server and converted to PDF/A format.

External_Reference.reference_text: Langseth, M. G., Lunar Heat Flow Experiment: Final Technical Report, Lamont-Doherty Geological Observatory of Columbia University, September 1977. NASA Technical Reports Server: https://ntrs.nasa.gov/archive/nasa/casi.ntrs.nasa.gov/19780010035.pdf
